com.esri.mo2.map.dpy
Class LayerEvent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.util.EventObject
        |
        +--com.esri.mo2.map.dpy.LayerEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class LayerEvent
extends EventObject

Sent to a LayerListener whenever a Layer is either added-to, moved-within, or removed-from a Map.

See Also:
LayerListener, Map, Serialized Form
